ent.",CancerGov,Metastatic Squamous Neck Cancer with Occult Primary
What is the outlook for Metastatic Squamous Neck Cancer with Occult Primary ?,Certain factors affect prognosis (chance of recovery) and treatment options. The prognosis (chance of recovery) and treatment options depend on the following:         - The number and size of lymph nodes that have cancer in them.    - Whether the cancer has responded to treatment or has recurred (come back).    - How different from normal the cancer ce
